case.title: Do Spanish Men Like White Women?? (Manhattan / Bronx)
case.text:
I am a 20 something white woman...Small BBW...Living and working in Manhattan. I happen to have a thing for Spanish men but I am wondering if Spanish men like white women? Thick, white women to be exact.
I'm looking for something serious...over time. Not looking to marry you in a week and I'm certainly NOT looking to be your NSA Sex buddy. Please reply with your photo and I will send mine. In the subject, place your occupation so I will know you are not a fake / spam.
